title: How good was Elvis Presley live in the 70s? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t wish to offend anyone’s religious beliefs, but the first time I saw him perform live, August 25, 1971, it was like Yahweh, Jesus, Buddha, and Mohammed rolled into one. From 1969 through 1973’s “Aloha From Hawaii,” Elvis was incomparable on stage.
